publication-policy-filterbar: Filters for policies of platforms regarding the publication of a scholarly work.
The platform has a policy regarding publishing on its own platfom.
Articles published on the platform can be published with an open access license.
elsewhere-policy-filterbar: Filters for policies of platforms regarding the publication of a scholarly work on other platforms.
evaluation-policy-filterbar: Filters for policies of platforms regarding the evaluation of a scholarly work.
ppo:PublicationPolicy: Policies of the platform regarding the publication of a scholarly work.
ppo:PublicationElsewherePolicy: Policies of the platform regarding the publication of a scholarly work on other platforms.
ppo:EvaluationPolicy: Policies of the platform regarding the evaluation of a scholarly work.
